summary: Completed comprehensive testing of School Administration SaaS with new teacher management, fee management, and access control features

design_issues.issue: Table shows loading state when no fee bills exist, could show empty state message instead

passed_tests: Backend API health checks (100% success rate)
Teacher management - create teacher with class assignment
Teacher salary payment system with remark and auto date/time
Teacher login and access restrictions (only Dashboard and Attendance)
Fee management page loading and create fee dialog
Header layout fix - content not hidden behind header
Navigation system working for both principal and teacher roles
